channel.title: Need client runner
channel.description:
Hello.
Has anyone got a client runner, which allows java 6 update 10 onto the client.
Please post if you can help.
Much appriciated.
:)

item.description:

item.title: Need client runner
item.dc:creator: @skillerz skillerz
item.description:
@skillerz wrote:

[quote=“Kalvin, post:3, topic:245615”]Not working…[/quote]OMG NEWB:P
Come onto msn or something not doing tv on u again ur lagging:P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 21, 2008, 03:10:40 pm[/size][hr]Some Runners:

@echo off COLOR 09 title client Starting up.. java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 pause

@echo off COLOR 09 title Client Runner @echo Client @echo ----------------------- java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 pause

@ECHO OFF title Client Runner color 0f java -Xmx1000m client highmem pause

@echo off COLOR 09 title Client @echo ----------------------- @echo Client Is Running @echo ----------------------- @echo Client!!!!! @echo ----------------------- java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Class51 0 0 highmem members 32 pause

@ECHO OFF TITLE Client JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI

Let’s see if some off them are workin’ alright? :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.description:

@echo -----------------------
java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32
pause
